subject: Re: [junit] Testing applets via its GUI
msgSnippet: ... Specifically applets or just UI-based applications? What kind of UI? Swing? AWT? J. B. Rainsberger, President, Diaspar Software Services Let s write
messageBody:

What kind of UI? Swing? AWT?
